title.narrative: Documentation of Ancient Monumental Earthworks on the Island of Babeldaob in the Republic of Palau

description.narrative: The monumental earthworks on Babeldaob cover at least a quarter of the island and represent over 2,000 years of island history. This project involves the documentation of the earthworks via remote sensing, archaeological field work, and oral history collection.

title.narrative: Assessment and Documentation of Archaeological and Historic Sites on Ngerkeklau Island

description.narrative: The small island of Ngarkeklau preserves archaeological features of past human occupation. This project involves the assessment and documentation of the historic village on the island.

title.narrative: Strengthen Trafficking in Persons (TIP) Data Collection in Pacific Islands

description.narrative: United Nations Office on Drugs and Crime (UNODC), will support strengthening human trafficking data collection systems to estimate and monitor the number of victims of trafficking inpersons. The Recipient will strengthen human trafficking data collection systems to estimate and monitor the number of victims of trafficking in persons in selected Pacific Islands countries.
